item.title: Pothole on road towards Birdlip, 5th November
item.description:
Pothole on carriageway towards Birdlip. Previous repair has now failed and most cars are now striking this pothole.

item.title: All 6 drains are blocked in Manor Road, 4th November
item.description:

item.title: I've been witnessing the builders dumping waste down drains, 4th November
item.description:
Property 287 prestbury road Cheltenham are having works done, the builders think the public drainage systems are there's to use, pouring various foul water and waste, brushing all the mess into the road, the streets yellow due to all the uncovered sand being washed down the road. This has been going on for a couple of weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 285, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 4th November
item.description:
Bicycle lane has been repainted. But the lane is so wide pedestrians have no where to walk. If walking with children you either have to walk right next to hedges, brambles, thorns and bus shelters (Which pushes you to walk over the line of the bicycle lane), or right next to the kerb, with traffic moving past it. This is going to cause hostility between pedestrians, bicycle riders and motorists. At the junction and lights of Hatherley Road, the lane widens and takes up the crossing. Where do pedestrians stand to cross? Where do mobility scooters cross? How are Mobility Scooters going to use the footway?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues
